title: Kathmandu sightseeing tour
description: A full‑day guided tour of Kathmandu’s UNESCO World Heritage Sites including Boudhanath, Swayambhunath, Pashupatinath, Patan and Bhaktapur Durbar Squares.

title: Boudhanath Stupa
description: Visit the iconic Buddhist stupa and cultural center of Boudhanath.

title: Pashupatinath Temple
description: Explore one of the most sacred Hindu temples in South Asia on the Bagmati River banks.

title: Swayambhunath Temple
description: The hilltop Monkey Temple offering views over Kathmandu valley and rich Buddhist heritage.

title: Patan Durbar
description: Stroll through the royal palaces and temples of Patan Durbar Square, noted for Newari architecture.

title: Bhaktapur and Patan Durbar
description: Discover two ancient Newar cities’ royal squares and temples.

title: Chandragiri Cable Car Tour in Kathmandu
description: Ride the Chandragiri hill cable car for panoramic views of Nepal’s Himalaya.

title: Dhulikhel, Namobuddha & Panauti – A Scenic Day Tour from Kathmandu
description: Visit historic towns and Buddhist pilgrimage sites near the Kathmandu valley.

title: Shivapuri
description: Nature hikes through Shivapuri National Park overlooking Kathmandu city.

title: Nagarkot Pure Tour
description: Sunrise and mountain-view tour at the tranquil Nagarkot hill station.

title: Sarangkot Sunrise Tour
description: Early‑morning tour from Pokhara to Sarangkot for sunrise views over Annapurna and Fewa Lake.

title: Peace Temple
description: Visit the World Peace Pagoda overlooking Fewa Lake and Pokhara valley.

title: Phewa Lake Tal
description: Boating on scenic Phewa Lake with mountain reflections.

title: Begnas Lake
description: Relax by peaceful Begnas Lake, a quieter alternative near Pokhara.

title: Gupteshwor Gupha
description: Explore the sacred Hindu cave temple near Pokhara’s lakeside.

title: Barahi Temple
description: Temple on an island in Phewa Lake, accessed by boat.

title: Tibetan Cultural Tour
description: Visit Tibetan refugee settlements, culture centers and monasteries in Pokhara.

title: Nagarkot Sunrise Tour
description: Drive to Nagarkot for sunrise views across the Himalayas.

title: Nagarkot Hiking Trail
description: Hiking trail up and around Nagarkot with panoramic mountain views.

title: Nature Walk in Chitwan Jungle Safari
description: Guided nature and jungle walk inside Chitwan National Park.

title: Jungle Safari Tour
description: Full jungle safari including elephant ride, canoe and jeep.

title: Elephant Breeding Centre
description: Visit the elephant breeding center and learn about conservation efforts.

title: Canoeing in Chitwan National Park
description: Canoe ride on Rapti River spotting wildlife and birds.

title: Tharu Village Tour
description: Cultural tour of Tharu villages near Chitwan National Park.

title: Bardiya National Park Tour
description: Wildlife safari and cultural tours in Bardiya National Park.

title: Full Day Walking Safari at Bardiya National Park
description: Walking safari through Bardiya’s forest for rhino and bird sightings.

title: Full Day Jeep Safari at Bardiya National Park
description: Jeep safari through Bardiya National Park to see wildlife.
